ankit@gmail.com.title: Modal Verb Conjugation (Kann)
ankit@gmail.com.description: Replaces the English modal verb 'Can I' with the German equivalent 'Kann ich'.
ankit@gmail.com.question: Can I help you?

ankit@gmail.com.title: Kaffee
ankit@gmail.com.description: Replaces the English word 'coffee' with the German word 'Kaffee'.
ankit@gmail.com.question: I like to drink coffee in the morning.
ankit@gmail.com.answer: I like to drink Kaffee in the morning.

ankit@gmail.com.title: Grammar (möchte)
ankit@gmail.com.description: Replaces the English phrase 'want to' with the German word 'möchte'.
ankit@gmail.com.question: I want to eat.

ankit@gmail.com.title: Modal Verb (möchte)
ankit@gmail.com.description: Replaces 'like to' with the German modal verb 'möchte'.
ankit@gmail.com.question: I would like to go to the cinema.
